text:
ImpactFlow — Portland, OR. Onsite — Front End Engineer

Nonprofit-giving startup seeks a front end engineer to join our product development team. You will work with a small cross-functional group of engineers to develop front-end JavaScript for our SaaS web application/platform. Responsibilities:

- Write features within the platform's Backbone.js application

- Write unit tests and webdriver tests for everything you build

- Collaborate with designers and product stakeholders to shepherd products through development

- Test and fix bugs across multiple platforms and browsers (IE9+)

- Peer review code prior to merging/deployment

Learn more about the position and how to apply: https://gist.github.com/Lochlan/a97296e04977ba2cc735
